name: getEcommerceStoresIdOrdersIdLinesId
description: Get information about a specific order line item.

fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

exclude_fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

order_id.description: The id for the order in a store.

line_id.description: The id for the line item of an order.

$block: Information about a specific order line.

$ul: **_links**: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.
**discount**: The total discount amount applied to a line item.
**id**: A unique identifier for an order line item.
**image_url**: The image URL for a product.
**product_id**: A unique identifier for the product associated with an order line item.
**product_title**: The name of the product for an order line item.
**product_variant_id**: A unique identifier for the product variant associated with an order line item.
**product_variant_title**: The name of the product variant for an order line item.
